condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 7.2: Strengthened political commitment, accountability and national capacity to legislate, plan, budget and fund inclusive social policies.

description.narrative: National and sub-national level capacities on budgeting, budget monitoring and tracking have been improved through UNICEF's technical and financial support to the Ministry of Finance and Economic Development, The Parliament of Zimbabwe, Rural District Councils and Urban Local Authorities. Key successes also include the Education Act Amendment Bill, financing for Vaccines as well as local government efforts to enhance budget transparency. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:18/07/2019

title.narrative: Percentage share of non-wage spending in key social services by Local authorities

Percentage of national budget allocations on 2 or more key child sectors increased vs previous year
